subject: U.S. Department of Treasury
body:
U.S. Department of Treasury
Treasury Building 1500 Pennsylvania
Avenue, NW Washington, D.C., U.S
Attn Dear
This is to bring to your notice that the US Department of Treasury
in affiliation with the Office of Foreign Assets Control ("OFAC") has
been authorized to compensate 1,000 scam victims who were victims
of internet scam.The USA Department of the Treasury has decided
to pay you $5.5 Million each in order to alleviate
hardship and restore hope for some depressed scam victims.
You were mentioned by one of the syndicates who was
arrested here in United States by the FBI and United States secret
service as one of the victims of their operations.You are hereby
warned not to communicate or duplicate this message to him or her for
any reason whatsoever as the US SECRET SERVICE and FBI are already in
search of the other criminals anywhere around the world ,these information
should remain confidential till they are all apprehended,other victims
who have not been  contacted can submit their applications as well for
scrutiny and possible consideration.To make the payment simple,safe from any theft and to avoid risk of confiscation,
We have approved an ATM Master card for all the scam victims,and all necessary
arrangements for your ATM MASTER CARD Payment worth {US$5.500,000.00} have been
granted for your payment through Our ATM Card Issuance Department.
Now Your ATM Master Card is well packaged with all the legal
documents to convey it to you without having any problem with any
security Officials. Therefore we hereby invite you to our office
here in Washington DC ,United States, to enable us complete the
documentation and activation process of your ATM Master Card and issue the
Secret PIN CODE/NUMBER that will enable you to use your Card at any ATM
MACHINE nearest you in any Country , as soon as it is activated.
Best Regards,
Dr.Kate Henshaw(Mrs),
Assistant Secretary for Economic Policy,
United State Department of Treasury.

subject: Re:   U.S. Department of Treasury
body:
Hello Mrs. Henshaw,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear that I've been mentioned by a syndicate member. Could you please provide more details about how my name came up in their investigation? 

Also, the idea of receiving an ATM Master card is intriguing. However, I'm curious about the process involved in activating this card and how it would work internationally. Could you explain more about this?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Corinne

subject: Re: U.S. Department of Treasury
body:
Attn Beneficiary:

I want to acknowledge that I received your response and the content is duly
noted.I could not respond to your email earlier because I was out of office
for an international conference in Switzerland,pardon my delayed response.

 In line with the ATM Master Card Issuance guidelines, you are required to
come to our office here in Washington for documentation and to collect your
ATM Master Card and the Pin/pass code. But since you cannot come to
Washington due to illness, you have to send the following details to us
immediately.

YOUR FULL NAME...........................
ADDRESS.........................................
PHONE NUMBER.............................
OCCUPATION...................................
NEXT OF KIN....................................
COPY OF VALID ID CARD................

Our legal team will carry out the documentation process after which your
ATM Master Card will be sent to your designated address with the whole
legal documents attached.Be assured that your approved fund will get to
your designated address once you adhere to the instructions.
Best Regards,
Dr.Kate Henshaw (Mrs.)
Assistant Secretary for Economic Policy,
United State Treasury Department.

subject: Re: U.S. Department of Treasury
body:
Hello Mrs. Henshaw,

Thank you for your response and the information provided. I'm really excited about this ATM Master Card Issuance, it sounds like a great opportunity! 

I'm sorry to hear that I need to come to Washington, as my current health condition doesn't allow me to travel long distances. However, I'm glad there's an alternative way for me to get the card.

Before we proceed, could you please explain more about how this process works? And what is the purpose of the ATM Master Card? Also, could you tell me more about the legal documents that will be sent along with the card?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Corinne

subject: Re: U.S. Department of Treasury
body:
Attn Beneficiary:

Your email was received and the content was duly noted,

Be informed that your approved fund of $5.5million will be contained in the
ATM Master card, you can withdraw your fund in any ATM Gallery in your
country or anywhere in the world. But before the issuance of the Master
Card, there must be proper documentation done either by you or our legal
team on your behalf,there must a third party insurance on your fund, there
must also be Special Control Unit Against Money Laundry
Certification(SCUML) on your fund and full details must be on our database
for proper documentation and accountability to the US Government.

Therefore you are required to send the following detail:
YOUR FULL NAME...........................
ADDRESS.........................................
PHONE NUMBER.............................
OCCUPATION...................................
NEXT OF KIN....................................
COPY OF VALID ID CARD................
Best Regards,
Dr.Kate Henshaw (Mrs.)
Assistant Secretary for Economic Policy,
United State Treasury Department.

subject: Re: U.S. Department of Treasury
body:
Hello Mrs. Henshaw,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this approved fund and the ATM Master card. I must say, it's a new concept for me.

Could you please explain more about how this process works? How does the third party insurance on my fund work? And what is the Special Control Unit Against Money Laundry (SCUML)? 

I'm also curious about why my full details need to be on your database. Could you elaborate on that?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Corinne
